label: 52252 / 52253 / ZW3012
description: Enbrighten Z-Wave Plus In-Wall Smart Dimmer, No Neutral, LED-CFL, White and Light Almond Paddles, 700S

paramInformation.label: LED Light
paramInformation.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED ON when load is OFF
LED On when light is turned On

paramInformation.label: Invert Switch
paramInformation.description: Reverse the default On/Off rocker setting

paramInformation.label: Switch Mode
paramInformation.description: Turn your dimmer into an On/Off switch with switch mode

paramInformation.label: Alternate Exclusion
paramInformation.description: Enables alternate method for excluding the device to prevent accidental removal

options.label: Press any button on the switch
Press two times ON button and two time OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if successful

paramInformation.label: Minimum Dim Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the minimum dimmer threshold when manually or remotely controlled

paramInformation.label: Maximum Dim Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the maximum dim threshold when manually or remotely controlled

paramInformation.label: Brightness Level
paramInformation.description: Dimmer will turn ON to this level

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the top or bottom of the smart dimmer (rocker)
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the top or bottom of the smart dimmer (rocker)
metadata.reset: 1. Quickly press ON (top) button three times, then immediately press the OFF (bottom) button three times. The LED will flash ON/OFF five times when completed successfully
